sqlMap.update: update etop5.dbo.tb_supplier_ranking set supplier=#supplier#, begin_month=#begin_month#, kpi_1=#kpi_1#, operater=#operater#, update_date=getdate() where id = #id#
update etop5.dbo.tb_supplier_ranking_status set type=#type#, supplier=#supplier#, begin_month=#begin_month#, kpi_1=#kpi_1#, operater=#operater#, update_date=getdate() where id = #id#
